title: 11/02/21 DPS Hour 2 Nick Wright
itunes:title: 11/02/21 DPS Hour 2 Nick Wright
description:
Nick Wright talks to Dan about the Chiefs win on Monday Night Football. Nick says the Chiefs really need to play basic football and run the ball.
